target.query:
from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r.type == "temperature" and r._value > 30.0) or
    (r.type == "humidity" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "co2" and r._value > 1000.0) or
    (r.type == "traffic_speed" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value > 85.0) or
    (r.type == "seismic" and r._value > 4.0) or
    (r.type == "rain_level" and r._value > 50.0)
  )
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r.type == "temperature" and r._value <= 30.0 and r._value > 28.0) or
    (r.type == "humidity" and r._value <= 80.0 and r._value > 75.0) or
    (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value <= 85.0 and r._value > 80.0)
  )
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: 1, text: r.emergency_type + " @ " + r.location + " (" + r.severity + ")"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "text"])

targets.query:
from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "lat" or r._field == "lon" or r._field == "¬∞C" or r._field == "%" or r._field == "ppm" or r._field == "km/h" or r._field == "dB" or r._field == "Mw" or r._field == "mm/h")
  |> group(columns: ["location", "_field"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["location"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.lat > 0.0 and r.lon > 0.0)
  |> rename(columns: {"lat": "latitude", "lon": "longitude"})
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with
    display_value:
      if "${map_display}" == "humidity" then r["%"]
      else if "${map_display}" == "co2" then r.ppm
      else if "${map_display}" == "traffic" then r["km/h"]
      else if "${map_display}" == "noise" then r.dB
      else if "${map_display}" == "seismic" then r.Mw
      else if "${map_display}" == "rain" then r["mm/h"]
      else r["¬∞C"],
    display_pct:
      if "${map_display}" == "humidity" then r["%"] / 80.0 * 100.0
      else if "${map_display}" == "co2" then r.ppm / 1000.0 * 100.0
      else if "${map_display}" == "traffic" then r["km/h"] / 80.0 * 100.0
      else if "${map_display}" == "noise" then r.dB / 85.0 * 100.0
      else if "${map_display}" == "seismic" then r.Mw / 4.0 * 100.0
      else if "${map_display}" == "rain" then r["mm/h"] / 50.0 * 100.0
      else r["¬∞C"] / 30.0 * 100.0
  }))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["sensorid"])
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Active Sensors"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r.type == "temperature" and r._value > 30.0) or
    (r.type == "humidity" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "co2" and r._value > 1000.0) or
    (r.type == "traffic_speed" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value > 85.0) or
    (r.type == "seismic" and r._value > 4.0) or
    (r.type == "rain_level" and r._value > 50.0)
  )
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Violations"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ppm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group()
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: (1200.0 - r._value) / 8.0, _field: "Air Quality Index"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "lat" and r._field != "lon")
  |> group()
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: int(v: r._time) / 1000000, _field: "Last Update"}))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r.type == "temperature" and r._value > 30.0) or
    (r.type == "humidity" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "co2" and r._value > 1000.0) or
    (r.type == "traffic_speed" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value > 85.0) or
    (r.type == "seismic" and r._value > 4.0) or
    (r.type == "rain_level" and r._value > 50.0)
  )
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: r.type, _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {"temperature": "üå°Ô∏è Temperature", "humidity": "üíß Humidity", "co2": "üå´Ô∏è CO‚ÇÇ", "traffic_speed": "üöó Traffic", "noise_level": "üîä Noise", "seismic": "üåã Seismic", "rain_level": "üåßÔ∏è Rain"})

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field != "lat" and r._field != "lon")
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: r.location, _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "¬∞C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.location}))

  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Temperature", location: r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field", "location"])
  |> yield(name: "temperature")

  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field", "location"])
  |> yield(name: "rain")

data = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["sensorid", "location", "type"])

min_val = data |> min() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Min"}))
max_val = data |> max() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Max"}))
mean_val = data |> mean() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Mean"}))
last_val = data |> last() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Last"}))

union(tables: [min_val, max_val, mean_val, last_val])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["sensorid", "location", "type"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["sensorid", "location", "type", "Min", "Max", "Mean", "Last"])
  |> rename(columns: {sensorid: "Sensor", location: "Location", type: "Type"})
  |> sort(columns: ["Max"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: if (r.type == "temperature" and r._value > 30.0) or
                 (r.type == "humidity" and r._value > 80.0) or
                 (r.type == "co2" and r._value > 1000.0) or
                 (r.type == "traffic_speed" and r._value > 80.0) or
                 (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value > 85.0) or
                 (r.type == "seismic" and r._value > 4.0) or
                 (r.type == "rain_level" and r._value > 50.0)
              then 1 else 0,
      _field: r.location + " ‚Äî " + r.type
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "severity_level")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: if r._value > 0 then r._value else 0, _field: "Emergency Status"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active")
  |> last()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r.emergency_type + " @ " + r.location, _field: "Active Emergency"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1)
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Total Events"}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value == 1)
  |> group(columns: ["emergency_type"])
  |> count()
  |> group()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: r.emergency_type, _time: now()}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {"fire": "üî• Incendio", "flood": "üåä Alluvione", "earthquake": "üèöÔ∏è Terremoto", "gas_leak": "‚ò£Ô∏è Gas Leak", "traffic_accident": "üöó Incidente"})

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "severity_level")
  |> group(columns: ["emergency_type", "location"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.emergency_type + " @ " + r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "emergencies")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "active")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      Time: string(v: r._time),
      Type: r.emergency_type,
      Location: r.location,
      Severity: r.severity,
      Active: r._value
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 50)
  |> keep(columns: ["Time", "Type", "Location", "Severity", "Active"])

options.content:
| Sensor | Threshold | Unit |
|---|---|---|
| üå°Ô∏è Temperature | > **30.0** | ¬∞C |
| üíß Humidity | > **80.0** | % |
| üå´Ô∏è CO‚ÇÇ | > **1000** | ppm |
| üöó Traffic Speed | > **80.0** | km/h |
| üîä Noise Level | > **85.0** | dB |
| üåã Seismic | > **4.0** | Mw |
| üåßÔ∏è Rain Level | > **50.0** | mm/h |

targets.query:
from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r.type == "temperature" and r._value > 30.0) or
    (r.type == "humidity" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "co2" and r._value > 1000.0) or
    (r.type == "traffic_speed" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value > 85.0) or
    (r.type == "seismic" and r._value > 4.0) or
    (r.type == "rain_level" and r._value > 50.0)
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      Time: string(v: r._time),
      Value: r._value,
      Unit: r._field,
      Sensor: r.sensorid,
      Location: r.location,
      Type: r.type
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 50)
  |> keep(columns: ["Time", "Value", "Unit", "Sensor", "Location", "Type"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "${sensor_type}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.location}))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "${location}")
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: r.type}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "${location}")
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.type}))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["sensorid", "location", "type", "_field"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      Sensor: r.sensorid,
      Location: r.location,
      Type: r.type,
      Unit: r._field,
      Value: r._value,
      _time: r._time
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["Sensor", "Location", "Type", "Unit", "Value", "_time"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location", "type"])
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: r.type, location: r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field", "location"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> keep(columns: ["location"])
  |> distinct(column: "location")
  |> sort(columns: ["_value"])
